title: Children's Theatre
creator_credit: Lilias Fraser, John Morris, Frank Bagnall and Australian National Film Board
brief_description: Children at the Studio Theatre in Adelaide study painting, music and speech as part of their training in ballet. This is a Children’s Theatre for children and by children. Classes and rehearsals, planning and teaching precede the performance of an Australian ballet, telling the story of an Australian aboriginal legend.
